column4: Okay xorg conf hell: doing sudo dpkg-reconfigure sxerver-xorg under breezy I set everything right, but still getting twazz-outs every time I start x, with tons of monitor resolutions being tried and failing despite configuration.
Sorr, kling0n, thought you meant me ;)
you're having the same problem as my bro... he's got SLI'd 6600 gt's and can't get a screen to come up in X
